purpose: Facilitate the development of MCP servers with a focus on long-term memory capabilities for agents.
principle: Built with Python, leveraging modular design to support memory persistence in agent systems.
reusability: Can be used as a starting point for developing custom MCP servers, with modular components for easy integration.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, with potential stability and feature completeness issues.
name: mcp-mem0
description: MCP server for long term agent memory with Mem0. Also useful as a template to get you started building your own MCP server with Python!
highlight: Template for building MCP servers with Python, focused on long-term agent memory.
